headline.print_headline: Can A Soda Tax Save Us From Ourselves?
headline.seo: Can a Soda Tax Protect Us From Ourselves?
headline.main: Can a Soda Tax Save Us From Ourselves?

docs.lead_paragraph: A tax on sugary drinks has been proposed in New York, raising the question of whether government should be the parent of the consumer’s inner child.
docs.snippet: A tax on sugary drinks has been proposed in New York, raising the question of whether government should be the parent of the consumer’s inner child.
